response.answer_text: Yes iPad is a tablet. A tablet is just a device type, a common name of such devices.iPhone is a phone. A smartphone. Phone, smartphone is just a device type.Mac is a PC. A PC (personal computer) is just a device type. Although the above is true, if those have a “better”, more restricted name, use the better names: iPads, iPhones, Macs. But still a tablet does not mean it is an Android tablet. A smartphone does not mean is is a Samsung phone or running Android. A PC could run Linux or Mac OS, or Windows… Or in other words an iPad is a subset of all tablets… A Mac laptop is a subset of all PC laptops.
